doc.title: 24 in Seven
doc.plot: The 24 Hours of Rapelje is an annual 24-hour mountain bike race in Rapelje, Montana hosted by the Stockman Cafe to raise support for the cafe and surrounding communities. Although this race got rained out after seven hours the film highlights the event, the mud, the beer, the bikes and the people that make up this lifestyle.
